Tool

NameFill Sinks (Planchon/Darboux, 2001)
ID3
AuthorCopyrights (c) 2003 by Volker Wichmann
Specificationgrid

Description

Depression filling algorithm after Olivier Planchon & Frederic Darboux (2001) References: Planchon, O. & F. Darboux (2001): A fast, simple and versatile algorithm to fill the depressions of digital elevation models. Catena 46: 159-176

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
DEM Grid (input)DEMdigital elevation model [m]
Output
Filled DEMGrid (output)RESULTprocessed DEM
Options
Minimum Slope [Degree]Floating pointMINSLOPEminimum slope angle preserved from one cell to the next, zero results in flat areas [Degree]Minimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.010000
